document_data.name: Onharr
document_data.mainbody: '''Onharr the Scalebright''' was the [[enchanter]] owner of a famed lavish festhall [[Serpentspires]] in the pre-[[Weeping War]] [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Possessions: Serpentspires held Onharr's livelihood and his passion, most were reduced to rubble or buried deep in the cellars of the half-destroyed festhall.
